title: IBM
description: Offering innovative energy storage solutions—including batteries, flywheels, and pumped-hydro systems—to facilitate the integration of renewable energy into power grids, this company aids in reducing fossil fuel dependence and helps countries achieve their net-zero goals.

children.value: Offering innovative energy storage solutions—including batteries, flywheels, and pumped-hydro systems—to facilitate the integration of renewable energy into power grids, this company aids in reducing fossil fuel dependence and helps countries achieve their net-zero goals.
